name: Flown
summary:
Flown is a highly original game, Tap and tilt your way to the top in this simple, fun game, with 36 of the craziest characters to collect,
especially number 7!
Help the Early Bird find his friends on a quest that will take you deep under the sea to the farthest reaches of outer space! Flap your wings through 6 different worlds enlisting the help of all the pets and wild creatures you find along the way!
